DESCRIPTION: Each turn, Grapple is reduced by #b1.
Shuffle a Void card into your draw pile.
Compelled creatures lose HP, give themselves #yDebuffs, and give the player #yBuffs depending on their #yIntent.
Move X cards from your draw pile to your discard pile.
Shuffle X cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.
Combo is lost when HP is lost from enemies and when a card without Combo is played. Build up your Combo for special benefits.
